titles.title: Wakefield Act of 2014
Wakefield Act of 2014
To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Emergency Medical Services for Children Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Unanimous Consent .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 113-559.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 419.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: 7/24/2014--Reported to House amended. Wakefield Act of 2014 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Emergency Medical Services for Children Program through FY2019.
